definitions.definition: A person with a paranormal sensitivity to something that most cannot perceive.
Having the faculty of sensation; pertaining to the senses.
(of a person) Easily offended, upset or hurt.
definitions.example: Max is very sensitive; he cried today because of the bad news.

definitions.definition: (of an issue, topic, etc.) Capable of offending, upsetting or hurting.
definitions.example: Religion is often a sensitive topic of discussion and should be avoided when dealing with foreign business associates.

definitions.definition: Meant to be concealed or kept secret.
(of an instrument) Accurate; able to register small changes in some property.
Having paranormal abilities that can be controlled through mesmerism.
